intro: Psychotria pseudojapurensis, commonly known as the Japurensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. This plant typically grows as an understory shrub in humid, shaded environments. It produces small, greenish-white flowers and has elliptical, glossy leaves. The plant is notable for its chemical composition, containing various alkaloids that have been studied for their potential pharmacological properties.
